All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiConfig
Configuration class for API-related beans and components.
AuthorizationController
RESTFUL Controller class for handling only authentication operations.
AuthorizationService
Interface to manage the authorization service.
AuthorizationServiceImpl
Implementation of the authorization service.
AuthResponse
Class to manage the authentication response.
CustomAuthenticationManager
CustomAuthenticationManager is responsible for authenticating users by username and password.
CustomUserDetailsService
Custom implementation of UserDetailsService of Spring Security.
DataPlayer
Manage a game by listing the dice and the result.
DataPlayerResponse
Class to manage the data player response.
DiceGameApplication
Main class of the application.
Game
Utility class to manage the game.
GameController
Controller class for handling the game endpoints.
GameResponse
Class to manage the game response.
GameService
Interface to manage the game service.
GameServiceImpl
Class to manage the game service implementation.
InvalidCredentialsException
Exception class to manage invalid credentials.
InvalidPlayerException
Exception class to manage invalid player.
JWTAuthenticationFilter
Handles JWT-based authentication.
JWTAuthEntryPoint
Handles authentication entry point exception related to JWT authentication.
JWTGenerator
Handles JWT generation and validation.
Player
Manages player data in the communication with the database.
PlayerDTO
Manage the data of player and her history out of database.
PlayerRepository
Manages the communication with the database for requests related and their games, except for registration and login.
PlayerResponse
Class to manage the player response.
PlayerService
Interface for the player service.
PlayerServiceImpl
Interface for the player service implementation.
Role
Specified a role of player can be in the game.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for Spring Security to handle authentication and authorization with JWT (JSON Web Tokens) to enter the API.
SecurityConstants
Stores security constants.
SessionPlayer
Manages the player session in the database.
SessionPlayerDTO
Manage a player session out of the database.
SessionPlayerRepository
Manages the communication with the database for player related requests regarding registration and login.
SessionPlayerService
Interface to manage the player service.
SessionPlayerServiceImpl
Class to manage the player service implementation.
